define: Get the list of SSP with main info as ssp_id, product_name, gtin, oem codes.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The size of one page.

The limit of page_size is [1,20], and default page_size is 10.

","name":"page_size","sample":"4","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"MXcMcdj"},{"description":"

Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is \"\", if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"offset","sample":"\"\"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"iPQpzdP"}],"response_params":[{"description":"
